profile.en:
Hyakkiyako Academy Inner Discipline Club's kind vice president.

A popular girl because she always has a gentle smile and is kind to everyone. The childhood friend of Tsubaki, the president of the Inner Discipline Club. She joined the club to fulfill her dream of becoming an elegant lady like the ones in the shoujo manga she used to read when she was young. She continues to train diligently by cooking and cleaning to make her dream come true.
profile.jp:
百鬼夜行連合学院所属、修行部の優しい副部長。

いつも朗らかな笑顔と穏やかな物腰で、皆からの人望が非常に厚い。幼い頃に読んだ少女漫画の影響で「大和撫子」になりたいという夢を抱き、修行部へと入った。幼馴染であり部長でもあるツバキとともに、料理や掃除などの修行に日々邁進している。
profile.zh_cn_jp:
百鬼夜行联合学院所属，「修行部」温柔的副部长。

总是笑容开朗、举止沉稳，在大家之间很有威信。
受到小时候读的少女漫画的影响而有着想成为「大和抚子」的梦想，并加入了修行部。
每天与同是儿时玩伴兼部长的椿一起，向着料理扫除一类的修行径直前行。
profile.zh_cn_tw:
百鬼夜行学园所属，修行部的温柔副部长。

总是保持着开朗的笑容与沉稳的举止，因此非常受大家景仰。受年幼时阅读的少女漫画影响，抱有成为「大和抚子」的梦想，从而进入了修行部。与青梅竹马兼部长的椿一起，每天都在进行料理及打扫之类的修行。
profile.zh_cn_cn:
百鬼夜行修行部温柔的副部长。

脸上一直挂着温和的笑容，对每个人都同样亲切，因此受到众人的欢迎。和修行部部长椿是童年玩伴，受到小时候读过的少女漫画影响，怀揣着成为窈窕淑女的梦想加入了修行部。为了实现这个梦想，她每天都在努力做烹饪与打扫的修行。

gacha.en:
I still have a long way to go...
but I'll show you the results of my training.
gacha.jp:
まだまだ未熟者ですが……
修行の成果、お見せいたします
gacha.zh_cn_jp:
虽说还不够成熟……
还请见识一下，我修行的成果
gacha.zh_cn_tw:
虽然还尚未成才……
不过，我会向老师展现修行的成果
gacha.zh_cn_cn:
虽然现在还不够完美……
但还是请看看我修行的成果吧！

intro.en: Heehee. Hello, Sensei. I'm Mimori from the Inner Discipline Club. I look forward to working with you.
intro.jp:
ふふっ。ごきげんよう、先生。
修行部のミモリです。
これから、末永くよろしくお願いいたしますね。
intro.zh_cn_jp:
ふふっ。ごきげんよう、先生。
修行部のミモリです。
これから、末永くよろしくお願いいたしますね。
intro.zh_cn_tw:
呵呵。你好，老师。
我是修行部的三森。
今后，请多多指教直到永远哦。

desc.en: Mimori comes to wake up [USERNAME] Sensei, who has overslept due to their busy schedule. As an aspiring "proper lady," Mimori prepares a perfect breakfast for Sensei.
desc.jp: Mimori comes to wake up [USERNAME] Sensei, who has overslept due to their busy schedule. As an aspiring "proper lady," Mimori prepares a perfect breakfast for Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 由于熬夜处理公务的关系，[USERNAME]老师不小心睡过了头，幸好{cf三森}很快便来叫醒了他。老师起床后，梦想成为大和抚子的{cf三森}还为老师准备了一份完美的早餐。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

name.en: The Eccentric Girl from the Yin-Yang Club
name.jp: The Eccentric Girl from the Yin-Yang Club

desc.en:
The Idol of Momoyodou invites Sensei to Hyakkiyako's Cherry Blossom Festival!
But trouble arises when the streets are overrun by delinquents and...a ninja?!
Brace yourself as the uproarious fun begins!
desc.jp:
The Idol of Momoyodou invites Sensei to Hyakkiyako's Cherry Blossom Festival!
But trouble arises when the streets are overrun by delinquents and...a ninja?!
Brace yourself as the uproarious fun begins!
desc.zh_cn:
因为接到了传统吃茶店「百夜堂」的看板娘突然打来的电话，
老师决定前往{sn百鬼夜行}联合学园的祭典「百夜之春樱花祭」！
但是神秘的问题儿童们和忍者女孩却正在那里作乱！？
狂乱的祭典骚动，即将开始！

desc.en: Izuna and the Mouryo's attacks are thwarted, but they flee and claim things will be different the next time. Sensei and Shizuko decide to join forces to find the culprit responsible for hiring Izuna and the Mouryo.
desc.jp: Izuna and the Mouryo's attacks are thwarted, but they flee and claim things will be different the next time. Sensei and Shizuko decide to join forces to find the culprit responsible for hiring Izuna and the Mouryo.
desc.zh_cn: 虽然顺利打倒来犯的妖怪剧团和{cf伊树菜}，他们一行人却撂下狠话说下次情况就不一样了，说完就逃之夭夭。最后，为了找出雇用妖怪剧团和{cf伊树菜}的元凶，老师和{cf静子}便一起行动。

desc.en:
The Idol of Momoyodou invites Sensei to Hyakkiyako's Cherry Blossom Festival!
But trouble arises when the streets are overrun by delinquents and...a ninja?!
Brace yourself as the uproarious fun begins!
desc.jp:
The Idol of Momoyodou invites Sensei to Hyakkiyako's Cherry Blossom Festival!
But trouble arises when the streets are overrun by delinquents and...a ninja?!
Brace yourself as the uproarious fun begins!
desc.zh_cn:
因为接到了传统吃茶店「百夜堂」的看板娘突然打来的电话，
老师决定前往{sn百鬼夜行}联合学园的祭典「百夜之春樱花祭」！
但是神秘的问题儿童们和忍者女孩却正在那里作乱！？
狂乱的祭典骚动，即将开始！

desc.en: When Date Meowru's plan fails, the Mouryo run away and Shizuko unleashes her fists of fury on Date Meowru.
desc.jp: When Date Meowru's plan fails, the Mouryo run away and Shizuko unleashes her fists of fury on Date Meowru.
desc.zh_cn: 当喵天丸所准备的杀手锏以失败告终，妖怪剧团便逃之夭夭。此时愤怒的{cf静子}狠狠赏了喵天丸一记重拳。

desc.en: The Ninjutsu Research Club helps run the Hyakkiyako and Gehenna meeting so they can earn official club status.Will they be able to pull it off?
desc.jp: The Ninjutsu Research Club helps run the Hyakkiyako and Gehenna meeting so they can earn official club status.Will they be able to pull it off?
desc.zh_cn:
为了成为正式的社团，{cn忍术研究部}决定协助{sn百鬼夜行}和{sn格黑娜}的交流会。
然而这两所学园的交流会想必无法风平浪静地结束……

name.en: Business Trip! Momoyodou Beach Shack Franchise Plan
name.jp: Business Trip! Momoyodou Beach Shack Franchise Plan
name.zh_cn: 出差！百夜堂大海之家加盟计划

desc.en: Members of Momoyodou visit the summer beach for a new business venture. However, they realize they got scammed in an insidious scheme! Shizuko declares that she will not go down like this and a new Momoyodou battle begins!
desc.jp: Members of Momoyodou visit the summer beach for a new business venture. However, they realize they got scammed in an insidious scheme! Shizuko declares that she will not go down like this and a new Momoyodou battle begins!
desc.zh_cn:
为了打开新的事业「海之家」，百夜堂一行人来到了渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是渡假胜地之间的权利争夺「Resort・Battle Royal」。
究竟{cf静子}能否顺利守护「海之家」呢──！？百夜堂崭新的战斗，即刻开始。

desc.en: Members of Momoyodou visit the summer beach for a new business venture. However, they realize they got scammed in an insidious scheme! Shizuko declares that she will not go down like this and a new Momoyodou battle begins!
desc.jp: Members of Momoyodou visit the summer beach for a new business venture. However, they realize they got scammed in an insidious scheme! Shizuko declares that she will not go down like this and a new Momoyodou battle begins!
desc.zh_cn:
为了打开新的事业「海之家」，百夜堂一行人来到了渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是渡假胜地之间的权利争夺「Resort・Battle Royal」。
究竟{cf静子}能否顺利守护「海之家」呢──！？百夜堂崭新的战斗，即刻开始。

desc.en: Shizuko finds out that she's been caught up in a huge scam. She decides to jump right into the battle to set things right despite Niya's objections.
desc.jp: Shizuko finds out that she's been caught up in a huge scam. She decides to jump right into the battle to set things right despite Niya's objections.
desc.zh_cn: 知晓「渡假胜地使用权」的总负责人变为「{cn节庆营运管理部}」的一行人，从{cf静子}听说和章鱼银行缔结的契约内容。然而，判明了章鱼银行并不是实际存在的企业……。得知被欺骗的{cf静子}，即使受到打击也在此情况将计就计，宣言了要从占领了{sn其他}岛屿的人们回收契约书。

desc.en: Members of Momoyodou visit the summer beach for a new business venture. However, they realize they got scammed in an insidious scheme! Shizuko declares that she will not go down like this and a new Momoyodou battle begins!
desc.jp: Members of Momoyodou visit the summer beach for a new business venture. However, they realize they got scammed in an insidious scheme! Shizuko declares that she will not go down like this and a new Momoyodou battle begins!
desc.zh_cn:
为了打开新的事业「海之家」，百夜堂一行人来到了渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是渡假胜地之间的权利争夺「Resort・Battle Royal」。
究竟{cf静子}能否顺利守护「海之家」呢──！？百夜堂崭新的战斗，即刻开始。
